lead_paragraph: Rod Laver figured Novak Djokovic might very well be the player, and this might very well be the year, that would finally end his distinction as the last man to win a calendar-year Grand Slam.

headline.print_headline: Laver Thought Djokovic 'Could Be the Guy to' Win Grand Slam
headline.main: Laver Thought Djokovic 'Could Be the Guy to' Win Grand Slam

snippet: Rod Laver figured Novak Djokovic might very well be the player, and this might very well be the year, that would finally end his distinction as the last man to win a calendar-year Grand Slam....
